name: Rattenfanger 2099
description:
As a rat version of Pied Piper you have to save your small rat friends from the evil spacecats who are patroling the building complex.

All you can do, is play your flute and control the rats!

Make it down to earth from the rooftops of the highest skyscrapers and fight (or use) your enemies to save as many rats as you can!
